name: Invoke-Obfuscation VAR++ LAUNCHER OBFUSCATION
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via VAR++ LAUNCHER
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`powershell.file.script_block_text:/(?i).*&&set.*(\{\d\}){2,}\\\"\s+?\-f.*&&.*cmd.*\/c/`
